claim: During the 2015/2016 campaign, Spain's La Liga recorded more drawn matches than any other league.
extra_info: most matches end as draw refers to MAX(SUM(home_team_goal = away_team_goal)); 2016 season refers to season = '2015/2016';
reasoning: In the 2015/2016 season, Spain's La Liga (Spain LIGA BBVA) recorded 92 drawn matches, ranking 4th. France Ligue 1 had the most draws with 108, followed by England Premier League with 107. The claim that La Liga recorded more drawn matches than any other league is contradicted by the data.

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT L.name, C.name AS country, SUM(CASE WHEN M.home_team_goal = M.away_team_goal THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS draws
FROM Match M
JOIN League L ON M.league_id = L.id
JOIN Country C ON M.country_id = C.id
WHERE M.season = '2015/2016'
GROUP BY L.name
ORDER BY draws DESC;
"

sqlite3 -header -column "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT L.name, C.name AS country, SUM(CASE WHEN M.home_team_goal = M.away_team_goal THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS draws
FROM Match M
JOIN League L ON M.league_id = L.id
JOIN Country C ON M.country_id = C.id
WHERE M.season = '2015/2016'
GROUP BY L.name
ORDER BY draws DESC;
"

Switzerland Super League  Switzerland  47

content.text:
The data clearly shows that in the 2015/2016 season, **France Ligue 1** had the most drawn matches (108), followed by England Premier League (107). Spain's La Liga (Spain LIGA BBVA) had only 92 draws, ranking 4th — not 1st.

```json

France Ligue 1 had the most draws with 108, followed by England Premier League with 107. The claim that La Liga recorded more drawn matches than any other league is contradicted by the data."}
```
